ModMetaData.name: Flora reskin [Reupload]
ModMetaData.author: cattleya
ModMetaData.description: Information Reupload of cattleya mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2431123295 -Updating mod to the new version Disclaimer: I am not the creator of this mod, all credit goes to cattleya. This is just a Reupload Original Description https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/p74ztf8fy6h0s5m/description.png All plants were redrawn. Also added several terrain textures. https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/04f126ah7zeeqdx/compatibility.png - saves should work without problems - compability with all my others mods - VGP Vegetable Garden - if you will have some troubles with others mods please tell me, maybe I can fix it. https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/boez0ci6j3ulage/license.png All images in this mod are licensed under the CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 : https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/ If you like this mod you can buy me coffee: https://ko-fi.com/artcattleya
